title: Gameon FT8D91 Drivers - USB Controller Adapter
description:
Hi,

These are the drivers for Gameon USB Controller Converter - FT8D91.  These will work on all versions of Windows from XP to 10. 


Win 7 -
Right click and "run as administrator". After installing drivers and plugging in device, reboot the pc and open "devices and printers" then right click "USB Composite Device". 
Click "Game Controller Settings" then "Properties" to configure.


Win 8-10 -
Right click and "run as administrator". After installing drivers and plugging in device, reboot the pc and open "control panel", then open "devices and printers" then right click "USB Composite Device".
Click "Game Controller Settings" then "Properties" to configure. The control panel can be hard to locate on windows 10, but its still there. 
You cannot access this from "PC Settings" and "devices", it doesn't show up like it does in control panel.


crash_override
